title: Abbington Cove: A Ghost Story
description: The old Abbington home at the Point has seen its share of tragedies over the years. Now desolate and abandoned, the former oceanfront summer retreat has become a source of reckoning for the Abbington family who have lived on the Cove for generations.The dramatic home, and the land it sits upon, evoke stories of witchcraft, hauntings and curses as two lifelong friends are slowly pulled into its lurid past.
author: Vin Petrini
